policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK CIBA Request Validation"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Customize this policy to add additional validations for CIBA request parameters"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
